positions.description: 𝘓𝘦𝘥 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘈𝘱𝘱 𝘚𝘵𝘰𝘳𝘦 𝘖𝘱𝘵𝘪𝘮𝘪𝘻𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯(𝘈𝘚𝘖), 𝘉𝘳𝘢𝘯𝘥 & 𝘗𝘦𝘳𝘧𝘰𝘳𝘮𝘢𝘯𝘤𝘦 𝘮𝘢𝘳𝘬𝘦𝘵𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘧𝘰𝘳 𝘢 𝘉2𝘊 𝘍𝘢𝘳𝘮𝘦𝘳 𝘈𝘱𝘱–𝘕𝘪𝘯𝘫𝘢 𝘒𝘪𝘴𝘢𝘯• Conducted competition & keyword research to identify high-traffic, low-competition KWs, boosting app visibility • Analyzed app store data and Optimized creatives & metadata, uplifting organic search rank for core keywords• Developed custom store & localized listings tailored for specific themes & languages, improving conversion rates by 20% • Leveraged data analytics, customer feedback & A/B tests to stabilize uninstalls & scale organic installs to 40K/month • Conducted user research to uncover insights on category behavior, pain points, media consumption, App usage, etc.• Developed distinctive brand identity & messaging based on insights from user research and competition analysis• Developed regionalized content for Perf. marketing, resulting in a 20% drop in CPI and a 15% increase in conv. rates • Collaborated with Agri influencers on branded content, improving branded search vol by 40% & Conv. rate by 18%• Leveraged Firebase analytics to stabilize D0 Uninstalls and W1 Retention, optimizing campaigns by pausing underperformers, refining communication, and reallocating budgets.
positions.title: Growth & Marketing Manager
positions.description_html:
𝘓𝘦𝘥 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘈𝘱𝘱 𝘚𝘵𝘰𝘳𝘦 𝘖𝘱𝘵𝘪𝘮𝘪𝘻𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯(𝘈𝘚𝘖), 𝘉𝘳𝘢𝘯𝘥 & 𝘗𝘦𝘳𝘧𝘰𝘳𝘮𝘢𝘯𝘤𝘦 𝘮𝘢𝘳𝘬𝘦𝘵𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘧𝘰𝘳 𝘢 𝘉2𝘊 𝘍𝘢𝘳𝘮𝘦𝘳 𝘈𝘱𝘱–𝘕𝘪𝘯𝘫𝘢 𝘒𝘪𝘴𝘢𝘯

• Conducted competition & keyword research to identify high-traffic, low-competition KWs, boosting app visibility
• Analyzed app store data and Optimized creatives & metadata, uplifting organic search rank for core keywords
• Developed custom store & localized listings tailored for specific themes & languages, improving conversion rates by 20%
• Leveraged data analytics, customer feedback & A/B tests to stabilize uninstalls & scale organic installs to 40K/month
• Conducted user research to uncover insights on category behavior, pain points, media consumption, App usage, etc.
• Developed distinctive brand identity & messaging based on insights from user research and competition analysis
• Developed regionalized content for Perf. marketing, resulting in a 20% drop in CPI and a 15% increase in conv. rates
• Collaborated with Agri influencers on branded content, improving branded search vol by 40% & Conv. rate by 18%
• Leveraged Firebase analytics to stabilize D0 Uninstalls and W1 Retention, optimizing campaigns by pausing underperformers, refining communication, and reallocating budgets.

positions.description: 𝘓𝘦𝘥 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘪𝘥𝘦𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯, 𝘱𝘪𝘭𝘰𝘵 𝘭𝘢𝘶𝘯𝘤𝘩, 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘱𝘳𝘰𝘨𝘳𝘢𝘮 𝘮𝘢𝘯𝘢𝘨𝘦𝘮𝘦𝘯𝘵 𝘰𝘧 𝘢 𝘭𝘰𝘺𝘢𝘭𝘵𝘺 𝘱𝘳𝘰𝘨𝘳𝘢𝘮 𝘵𝘰 𝘴𝘤𝘢𝘭𝘦 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘳𝘢𝘵𝘦 𝘰𝘧 𝘵𝘳𝘢𝘥𝘦𝘳 𝘢𝘤𝘲𝘶𝘪𝘴𝘪𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯 • Ideated the program, shortlisted potential test markets, Defined the GTM strategy, & scaled the program to 5 markets• Coordinated with external vendors to develop a digital referral tracking flow & Rewards withdrawal system • Identified bottlenecks slowing down the acquisition speed & influenced internal stakeholders to redesign processes• Designed automated dashboards to monitor onboarding progress, acquisition speed & team performance, in real-time.• Monitored burn rates, & implemented cost-control measures to scale efficiently without compromising program impact• Managed an on-ground team of 10 to achieve a 2.5x increase in acquisition speed while controlling the burn rate to 1.5x

𝘓𝘦𝘥 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘪𝘥𝘦𝘢𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯, 𝘱𝘪𝘭𝘰𝘵 𝘭𝘢𝘶𝘯𝘤𝘩, 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘱𝘳𝘰𝘨𝘳𝘢𝘮 𝘮𝘢𝘯𝘢𝘨𝘦𝘮𝘦𝘯𝘵 𝘰𝘧 𝘢 𝘭𝘰𝘺𝘢𝘭𝘵𝘺 𝘱𝘳𝘰𝘨𝘳𝘢𝘮 𝘵𝘰 𝘴𝘤𝘢𝘭𝘦 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘳𝘢𝘵𝘦 𝘰𝘧 𝘵𝘳𝘢𝘥𝘦𝘳 𝘢𝘤𝘲𝘶𝘪𝘴𝘪𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯

• Identified bottlenecks slowing down the acquisition speed & influenced internal stakeholders to redesign processes

We applied techniques like value chain mapping and inventory management model (Economic batch Quality ) to effectively reduce wastage and improve productivity at the contraction site.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: •Planning & Scheduling Worked on enhancements in APIs and error resolution for Planning & Scheduling Module of CRM-MES which includes Coil Linking, Coil De-Linking, Order Progress, Inventory Management, etc.•LogisticsCreated REST APIs and Oracle procedures for Extra to Order(ETO) , Planning Hold, Dispatch Reporting & Daily Production.•Data Exchange b/w SystemsImplemented data sharing of CRM-MES with Level 2 automation for PLTCM and CAL, Lab Management System, Order Management System for communication between these systems with CRM- MES.•Quality Assessment(QA)Developed QA Module of CRM-MES which includes Sample & Test Result Management , Quality Decision, Coil Hold, Lab Report, Batch Defect Management, Quality Summary & Coil Card which handles different functions of QA.•System Design(Low Level)Developed the application architecture, master page and common modules for database access, error logging, excel processing, common popups, etc. for IT system to manage operations of CRM of TSK  Plant.•MES AuditingDeveloped triggers and procedures for auditing changes of over 25+ tables which processes critical business data of CRM-MES for TSK Plant.•Reporting System Designed, developed & deployed of reporting system to digitize and automate the daily reporting system of HSM(Hot Strip Mill) Yard(3MTPA). It was further extended for other reports also.
experience.description_html:
•Planning & Scheduling
Worked on enhancements in APIs and error resolution for Planning & Scheduling Module of CRM-MES which includes Coil Linking, Coil De-Linking, Order Progress, Inventory Management, etc.

•Logistics
Created REST APIs and Oracle procedures for Extra to Order(ETO) , Planning Hold, Dispatch Reporting & Daily Production.

•Data Exchange b/w Systems
Implemented data sharing of CRM-MES with Level 2 automation for PLTCM and CAL, Lab Management System, Order Management System for communication between these systems with CRM- MES.

•Quality Assessment(QA)
Developed QA Module of CRM-MES which includes Sample & Test Result Management , Quality Decision, Coil Hold, Lab Report, Batch Defect Management, Quality Summary & Coil Card which handles different functions of QA.

•System Design(Low Level)
Developed the application architecture, master page and common modules for database access, error logging, excel processing, common popups, etc. for IT system to manage operations of CRM of TSK Plant.

•MES Auditing
Developed triggers and procedures for auditing changes of over 25+ tables which processes critical business data of CRM-MES for TSK Plant.

•Reporting System
Designed, developed & deployed of reporting system to digitize and automate the daily reporting system of HSM(Hot Strip Mill) Yard(3MTPA). It was further extended for other reports also.

Clubs: ▪️ Ex-member of the Association of Computing Machinery and IEEE student chapter, PES University. ▪️ Held a core team position at Codechef, PES University.

recommendations: Prasanna babu Sivakumar “I had the pleasure of mentoring and guiding Prisha during her internship at Fidelity Investments, where she consistently impressed me with her dedication and skills. Prisha demonstrated exceptional backend skills and the ability to collaborate effectively to solve problems quickly. She played a crucial role in our project, contributing to UX, API development, loading data into DynamoDB, and being a key contributor during UAT testing, which significantly helped the team meet deadlines. Two instances where Prisha stood out include the initial local workspace setup, where the team faced issues. Prisha proactively reached out to her friends and seniors to resolve and complete the setup within two days, a task that typically takes a week. During UAT testing, she actively tested the new UX workflows, identified defects, and fixed the issues she found. Beyond her technical skills, Prisha is a team player with a positive attitude and excellent communication skills. I wholeheartedly recommend Prisha for any position she pursues. Her talent and dedication will undoubtedly make her an asset to any team”

Rottala Karthikeya “It was pleasure working with Prisha during the role as a campus ambassador for our organization. Prisha exhibited exceptional dedication, creativity, and professionalism as Cisco Campus Ambassador, effectively engaged with students, organized successful events, and consistently exceeded our expectations. Her passion for our mission was evident in every task she undertook. I am confident that she will excel in any endeavor she chooses and strongly recommend her for future opportunities.”

We do this by delivering best-in-class networking technology through high-touch consultative relationships, backed by 26 years of experience in building the world’s most complex networks.Qlik’s vision is a data-literate world, where everyone can use data and analytics to improve decision-making and solve their most challenging problems. Qlik provides an end-to-end, real-time data integration and analytics cloud platform to close the gaps between data, insights and action. By transforming data into Active Intelligence, businesses can drive better decisions, improve revenue and profitability, and optimize customer relationships. Qlik does business in more than 100 countries and serves over 50,000 customers around the world.
experience.description_html:
Supported 2 RPO Projects

Ciena is a networking systems, services, and software company. We help our clients build more adaptive networks in response to the constantly changing demands of their users—businesses and consumers alike. We do this by delivering best-in-class networking technology through high-touch consultative relationships, backed by 26 years of experience in building the world’s most complex networks.

Qlik’s vision is a data-literate world, where everyone can use data and analytics to improve decision-making and solve their most challenging problems. Qlik provides an end-to-end, real-time data integration and analytics cloud platform to close the gaps between data, insights and action. By transforming data into Active Intelligence, businesses can drive better decisions, improve revenue and profitability, and optimize customer relationships. Qlik does business in more than 100 countries and serves over 50,000 customers around the world.

recommendations: Sai Gopal “Had the pleasure of working with Dipika at both her previous stints with Purple Quarter and Native. I rate her as one of the finest talents in executive search. Her eye for detail while deep diving into the requirements of clients was something that always impressed me in particular. Building a rapport with clients and candidates alike was another impressive trait. Goal oriented and hand on, she was an ever dependent colleague to work with. Wishing her all the very best.”

Jitender Sharan “I took help from Dipika to close a critical role in my org recently. She diligently created a profile of the responsibilities from our briefs and created proposals on candidate fitment. She also kept up with our own vision changes in this process. I believe her candidate liaison was exceptional and allowed a very high quality first touch. Her ability to drive coveted candidates in a tough economic scenario was unmatched. We appreciated that she worked hard to master our pitch and deliver it with clarity. The discussions, interviews and the closure were all smooth and predictable. I highly recommend her and would definitely work with her again.”

detailed_profile.name: Deepak kumar Sethi
detailed_profile.position: 🚀 Growth Marketing Strategist | Performance + Retention | D2C | SaaS | Martech | Expert in Paid Media, Funnels, Retention | CRM | Ex-Xto10x, HealthKart, HomeLane
detailed_profile.about: As a digital marketer with 6.5+ years of experience, I specialize in building and scaling performance-driven growth engines across SaaS, D2C, and new age brands. I’ve led cross-functional teams and owned full-funnel strategies—right from acquisition to retention—for some of India’s most dynamic startups including Mfine, HealthKart, HomeLane, and Xto10x. Whether it's launching a skincare D2C brand from scratch or driving demand gen for a SaaS platform, I’ve consistently delivered measurable results by combining data, customer insight, and rapid experimentation. I bring deep hands-on experience in performance marketing (Meta, Google, LinkedIn), CRM (MoEngage, Hubspot), landing page optimization, and revenue-focused marketing ops. Currently open to consulting opportunities or leadership roles in marketing where I can drive growth, solve problems, and build high-performing systems from the ground up.

detailed_profile.name: Plaban J Rajkhowa
detailed_profile.position: Crafting Seamless User Experiences | React, Next.js, TypeScript Expert | Product Engineer | Ex-Porter, Xto10x, GeekyAnts
detailed_profile.about: I’m a results-driven Software Engineer with 5+ years of experience specializing in crafting seamless user experiences and high-performing web applications. My technical expertise includes React, Next.js, and TypeScript, complemented by my strong leadership and project management skills. Throughout my career, I’ve led initiatives that improved operational efficiency, reduced costs, and enhanced user satisfaction. From consolidating legacy systems to streamlining content management workflows, my work consistently delivers measurable impact. I thrive in collaborative environments, where innovation and continuous improvement are celebrated. Let’s connect to discuss how we can create scalable, efficient solutions together! Key Highlights: ⭐️ Consolidated codebases to cut maintenance costs by 30% (Porter). ⭐️ Automated app deployment, reducing version inconsistencies (Xto10x). ⭐️ Scaled a team from 8 to 35+ employees, hiring and mentoring over 50 candidates (Glue Labs). ⭐️ Contributed to NativeBase and led a tech talk with 2.4K views on React Native Firebase (GeekyAnts).

experience.title: Customer Success Manager
experience.description: •Handle onboarding, setup, and ongoing support to ensure customers use the product smoothly and successfully.•Collaborate with product and engineering teams to launch features on time and in line with customers' needs.•Collect feedback from users and look for ways to improve the product and deepen client relationships.•Work closely with clients from different industries, including co-founders, strategy heads, and HR leaders, to understand their needs and offer the right solutions.•Contribute to shaping and improving our SaaS product, PeopleCues, by working closely on its structure and features.•Help growing startups set clear goals (OKRs) that match their daily operations and overall company vision, and design systems to track and improve performance.•Support business research by using both numbers (quantitative) and insights (qualitative) to guide decision-making.
experience.description_html:
•Handle onboarding, setup, and ongoing support to ensure customers use the product smoothly and successfully.
•Collaborate with product and engineering teams to launch features on time and in line with customers' needs.
•Collect feedback from users and look for ways to improve the product and deepen client relationships.
•Work closely with clients from different industries, including co-founders, strategy heads, and HR leaders, to understand their needs and offer the right solutions.
•Contribute to shaping and improving our SaaS product, PeopleCues, by working closely on its structure and features.

•Support business research by using both numbers (quantitative) and insights (qualitative) to guide decision-making.

detailed_profile.name: Raghavan Vallinayagam
detailed_profile.position: Director - HR | Scaling high-impact orgs | Data-led, AI-enabled people strategy, Capability, Succession | APAC | EMEA | NA
detailed_profile.about: "To Win the Marketplace, you must first Win the Workplace" - Douglas R. Conant I’m an HR leader and builder who has scaled teams and cultures across APAC, EMEA and NA. My experience spans launching and transforming People functions for fast-growing tech companies, driving talent strategy, cost savings, and building high-talent-density teams. I’ve been in the trenches with 100+ startups—designing orgs, hiring CXOs, and rolling out business-impact talent practices. I believe people strategy is core to business growth, and I love architecting solutions that make scale and innovation possible. I’ve managed P&L for HR tech (Peoplecues SaaS), led entrepreneurial turnarounds, and helped future-proof leadership pipelines globally. Always open to connect with fellow builders, founders, HR leaders and those shaping the future of work!.

recommendations: Tremayne Bess “Raghavan is a perfect blend of execution and strategic vision. With over a decade of HR experience, Raghavan's ability to execute along with his follow through is unparalleled. Any company would be lucky to have him and I'm definitely keeping him on my radar for potential future opportunities. I've been a firsthand benefactor of experiencing his overall business knowledge paired with his project management and multi-faceted HR skills. Congratulations to the next company that is privileged enough to partner with Raghavan!!”

Neeraj Aggarwal “Raghavan worked with us at xto10x for over 3 years, and has played a foundational role in helping build xto10x. As one of the earliest members of the People practice, not only did he work on a cross section of projects across many clients, he also helped manage the internal HR function. He has always been very high on founder's mindset, taking on newer mandates through his tenure (client engagements, internal HR, customer success leader for our HR SaaS product) and delivering big impact. Some of his standout achievements have been putting in place an industry best insurance cover for our people, streamlining our customer success function (leading to better retention and collections efficiency) and delivering high impact on different dimensions of HR related areas in our client projects. I strongly recommend Raghavan to anyone who is looking for a strong HR expert who wont hesitate in putting his hand up for any company building initiative.”
